entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 27.1.knots20240801 released
entry.summary:
Bitcoin Knots has rolled out its latest version, 27.1.knots20240801, which is now accessible for download at [https://bitcoinknots.org/files/27.x/27.1.knots20240801/](https://bitcoinknots.org/files/27.x/27.1.knots20240801/). This update introduces a set of new features aimed at enhancing the user experience. Additionally, it addresses various bugs and includes performance improvements, signifying a significant advancement in the software's development.
Users encountering issues with this release are encouraged to utilize the GitHub issue tracker for reporting. The tracker is available at [https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues). Further, individuals interested in staying abreast of Bitcoin Knots announcements can subscribe to updates at [https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/](https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/).
For those seeking an in-depth understanding of the enhancements and fixes included in version 27.1.knots20240801, the complete release notes provide a comprehensive overview. These notes are accessible through the project's GitHub page, specifically at [https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/blob/v27.1.knots20240801/doc/release-notes.md](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/blob/v27.1.knots20240801/doc/release-notes.md). This documentation offers valuable insights into the update's scope and its potential impact on Bitcoin Knots users.
